citations.desc: Records: Operators of auction sales and brokers.
citations.narrative:
Disposition records document the sale of a serval kitten on September 13, 2021. There are no records of acquisition
pertaining this kitten. Acquisition/Disposition records and animal inventory records inconsistently disclose animal
purchase dates, complete addresses, phone numbers, and license numbers of the persons from which the animals were
obtained. Records shall be maintained that fully disclose the information required in Part2, Subpart G, Section 2.76 of the
AWA Regulations for each animal. Correct by September 14, 2022.

citations.desc: Procurement of dogs, cats, and other animals; dealers.
citations.narrative:
Facility records and licensee statement indicate the following animals were obtained knowingly from an unlicensed
person:
March 24, 2022 - 1 capuchin and 1 geoffrey marmoset,
May 24, 2022 - 2 caracals and 1 capuchin,
July 7, 2022 - 3 caracal, 1 squirrel monkey and one capuchin
No dealer shall knowingly obtain any exotic animals from any person who is required to be licensed but does not currently
hold a valid license. The facility shall discontinue receiving animals from persons conducting unlicensed activity. Correct
from this date (9/2/22) forward.

The facility has not developed and documented a contingency plan as required in this section. The facility must develop,
document, and follow an appropriate plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and
care of their animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. Correct by September 30, 2022.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
